title: Lynda - Up and Running with React.js
description: A new JavaScript framework has arrived: React.js. React.js is designed to make the process of building modular, reusable user interface components simple and intuitive. Here Eve Porcello will help you learn React.js while guiding you through the process of building the interface for a bulletin board app. She reviews components, properties, and states, as well as the foundational parent/child relationships within React.js. Eve also describes the life cycle of components and how developers can trigger creation, lifetime, and teardown events. The course wraps with a chapter dedicated to building a more complete app with React.js and companion tools CommonJS, Browserify, and Reactify
